articles.author: Lauren Mascarenhas, CNN
articles.title: Covid-19 death rates 10 times higher in countries where most adults are overweight, report finds - CNN
articles.description: The risk of death from Covid-19 is about 10 times higher in countries where more than half of the population is overweight, according to a report released Wednesday by the World Obesity Forum.
